_meta.description: Custom paths to autoload models & mixins

sources.description: By default, LoopBack applications load models from `/common/models` subdirectory. To specify a different location (or even multiple locations) use the  `_meta.sources` property, whose value is an array of directory paths

mixins.description: Array of relative paths to custom mixin definitions. http://loopback.io/doc/en/lb3/Defining-mixins.html

additionalProperties.description: Configure models by model name. Add one property per model.

public.description: Whether the model API is exposed.If `true`, then the model is exposed over REST. Does not affect accessibility of Node API.

^data[sS]ource$.description: Name of the data source to which the model is connected. Must correspond to a data source defined in datasources.json: http://loopback.io/doc/en/lb3/datasources.json.html
